thread.title: Teacher charged with sending nude photos to student - Massachusetts news
thread.title_full: Teacher charged with sending nude photos to student - Massachusetts news

author: boston.com
title: Teacher charged with sending nude photos to student - Massachusetts news
text:
SOUTHBRIDGE, Mass. (AP) — A Southbridge teacher is accused of sending nude photos of himself to a high school student.
Police say 21-year-old Joseph Zuniga of Webster was arrested Wednesday and charged with dissemination of obscene matter to a minor.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Police say the Southbridge Middle/High School teacher sent nude photos to the 17-year-old boy through a Facebook message. A school resource officer overheard students talking about it and alerted police.
The school district says Zuniga is no longer an employee. He’s scheduled to appear in court Thursday. It’s unclear if he has an attorney.
Zuniga is the second teacher in the district to be arrested this year. In June, a middle school math teacher was arrested on charges that he tried to buy child pornography from the Philippines online.
